title: New Lev Rewards ?
body: So does anyone know when the new rewards are dropping or if they are ?

replies.body:
What are these new level rewards you're referring to?

 I haven't heard of this

Hiya :)

Most likely, it will happen with preseason since the current rewards revolve around the current Runes and Masteries system. When Runes Reforged comes into play, I reckon that is when the level rewards will be updated. 

There is a chance it could happen after Worlds, but I still believe preseason is when we'll see it. 

I hope this helps :D

Thanks :)
